org.bch.security.oauth

Class OAuth2LoginModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.security.auth.spi.AbstractServerLoginModule
      • org.jboss.security.auth.spi.UsernamePasswordLoginModule
        • org.jboss.security.auth.spi.DatabaseServerLoginModule
          • org.bch.security.oauth.OAuth2LoginModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule

    public class OAuth2LoginModule
extends org.jboss.security.auth.spi.DatabaseServerLoginModule
    Extension of the standard DatabaseServerLoginModule class to incorporate oauth2 and bearer tokens
    Author:
    CHIP-IHL

      • validateToken

        protected java.lang.String validateToken(java.lang.String token)
                                  throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Validates the token against the defined data source
        Parameters:
        token - The base64 encoded token
        Returns:
        (1) Null if token does not exists or is expired (2) The corresponding username when token is valid
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
